Class Header

  • java.lang.Object
    • Header

  • public class Header
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements the operations on the STUN message header. Everything that is represented with the keyword MUST is a requirement from RFC5389.
    Author:
    Frans

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addMagicCookieTo(byte[] request)
      A STUN Header MUST contain a Magic cookie with the value of 0x2112A442 according to RFC3489.
      static void addTransactionIDTo(byte[] request)
      A transaction ID MUST be uniformly and randomly chosen and should be cryptographically random.
      static void addTypeAndLengthTo(byte[] request)
      A STUN Header MUST contain Type and Length of the request
      static boolean compareMagicCookieIn(byte[] request)
      Takes a byte array and see if it has a STUN Magic Cookie at the right place.

      Method that extracts the Change request from the STUN header.

      For debugging reasons Setting the Level on the ConsoleHandler

    • Method Detail

      • connectConsoleHandler

        public static void connectConsoleHandler()
        For debugging reasons. Connect Handler to Logger in order to see Level.FINE messages

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(java.util.logging.Level newLevel)

        Parameters:

      • addTypeAndLengthTo

        public static void addTypeAndLengthTo(byte[] request)
        A STUN Header MUST contain Type and Length of the request
        Parameters:
        request - A STUN request

      • addMagicCookieTo

        public static void addMagicCookieTo(byte[] request)
        A STUN Header MUST contain a Magic cookie with the value of 0x2112A442 according to RFC3489.
        Parameters:
        request - A STUN request

      • addTransactionIDTo

        public static void addTransactionIDTo(byte[] request)
        A transaction ID MUST be uniformly and randomly chosen and should be cryptographically random.
        Parameters:
        request - A STUN request

      • compareMagicCookieIn

        public static boolean compareMagicCookieIn(byte[] request)
        Takes a byte array and see if it has a STUN Magic Cookie at the right place.
        Parameters:
        request - A STUN request
        Returns:
        true if magic cookie is there

      • getAddress

        public static java.net.InetSocketAddress getAddress(byte[] request,
                                                    int desiredType)
        Method that checks that the STUN attributes are there and then retrieves the mapped address. It is used by Clients to discover their IP. It checks if it's an IPv4 or IPv6 address, extracts the address and the port and returns it as an InetSocketAddress
        Parameters:
        request - A STUN request
        desiredType - What we want. Mapped address usually.
        Returns:
        Global IP address and Global Port number

      • getChangeRequest

        public static int getChangeRequest(byte[] request)
        Method that extracts the Change request from the STUN header. ChangeRequests are for alternating between servers in order to validate if the user is behind a symmetric NAT. Have not implemented that part but it gets the change request and tries to change port.
        Parameters:
        request - A STUN request
        Returns:
        The STUN value of a change request
